description: As they say, Christmas is always around the corner. And today I felt like on an Xmas eve. I didn´t find a presents under the Xmas tree but I got myself a little sweet cutie. Early twenties with perfect and soft skin. His smile was like a weapon of horny destruction for me. While we talked about his debts, I could even focus on writing. That´s how horny I´ve been, just looking at him. But when I offered him cash in exchange for sex, he was absolutely against it. That scared me a lot. I had to be more persuasive and do my best to be able to get his ass. Took me some time, but I got him into my money trap and soon enough he was striped down naked, obedient and about to start to suck my cock. He sucked me dry and I could bare the horniness any longer.
title: Debt Dandy 63
